CanvasRenderingContext2DFontVariantCaps.summary: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.fontVariantCaps property of the Canvas API specifies an alternative capitalization of the rendered text.

remarks.para: This corresponds to the CSS font-variant-caps property.

CanvasRenderingContext2DFontVariantCaps.value: The font alternative capitalization value, which is one of:The property can be used to get or set the font capitalization value.Note that there are accessibility concerns with some of these, which are outlined in the corresponding font-variant-caps topic.
